      ```css
          bottom: 0;
          width: 40px;
          height: 60px;
          background: linear-gradient(180deg, 
              transparent 0%,
              #8B0000 20%,
              #CD5C5C 40%,
              #DC143C 60%,
              #B22222 80%,
              #800000 100%
          );
          border-radius: 50% 50% 50% 50% / 60% 60% 40% 40%;
          animation: flicker 1.5s ease-in-out infinite;
          opacity: 0.8;
      }

      @keyframes flicker {
          0% {
              transform: scaleY(1) scaleX(1) rotate(-2deg);
              opacity: 0.7;
              filter: hue-rotate(0deg) brightness(1);
          }
          25% {
              transform: scaleY(1.1) scaleX(0.9) rotate(1deg);
              opacity: 0.9;
              filter: hue-rotate(5deg) brightness(1.1);
          }
          50% {
              transform: scaleY(0.9) scaleX(1.1) rotate(-1deg);

              filter: hue-rotate(3deg) brightness(1.05);
          }
          100% {
              transform: scaleY(1) scaleX(1) rotate(-2deg);
              opacity: 0.7;
              filter: hue-rotate(0deg) brightness(1);
          }
      }
      ```

```
1→<?php
     2→/**
     3→ * Tregnar SaaS Theme Functions
     4→ */
     5→
     6→// Enqueue theme styles
     7→function tregnar_saas_styles() {
     8→    wp_enqueue_style('tregnar-saas-style', get_stylesheet_uri(), array(), '1.0.0');
     9→    
    10→    // Add Google Fonts
    11→    wp_enqueue_style('google-fonts', 'https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700;800&display=swap', array(), null);
    12→}
    13→add_action('wp_enqueue_scripts', 'tregnar_saas_styles');
    14→
    15→// Theme setup
    16→function tregnar_saas_setup() {
    17→    // Add theme support for various features
    18→    add_theme_support('title-tag');
    19→    add_theme_support('post-thumbnails');
    20→    add_theme_support('html5', array(
    21→        'search-form',
    22→        'comment-form',
    23→        'comment-list',
    24→        'gallery',
    25→        'caption',
    26→    ));
    27→    add_theme_support('custom-logo');
    28→    add_theme_support('customize-selective-refresh-widgets');
    29→    
    30→    // Add support for Elementor
    31→    add_theme_support('elementor');
    32→    
    33→    // Register navigation menus
    34→    register_nav_menus(array(
    35→        'primary' => __('Primary Menu', 'tregnar-saas'),
    36→        'footer' => __('Footer Menu', 'tregnar-saas'),
    37→    ));
    38→}
    39→add_action('after_setup_theme', 'tregnar_saas_setup');
    40→
    41→// Customize the title for Tregnar
    42→function tregnar_custom_title($title) {
    43→    if (is_home() || is_front_page()) {
    44→        return 'Tregnar - Scale Your Website Portfolio';
    45→    }
    46→    return $title;
    47→}
    48→add_filter('wp_title', 'tregnar_custom_title');
    49→add_filter('pre_get_document_title', 'tregnar_custom_title');
    50→
```
